entry.content: "ğ‘¨ğ’ğ’… ğ’‚ğ’• ğ’•ğ’‰ğ’† ğ’†ğ’ğ’… ğ’ğ’‡ ğ’•ğ’‰ğ’† ğ’…ğ’‚ğ’š, ğ’šğ’ğ’–ğ’“ ğ’‡ğ’†ğ’†ğ’• ğ’”ğ’‰ğ’ğ’–ğ’ğ’… ğ’ƒğ’† ğ’…ğ’Šğ’“ğ’•ğ’š, ğ’šğ’ğ’–ğ’“ ğ’‰ğ’‚ğ’Šğ’“ ğ’ğ’†ğ’”ğ’”ğ’š, ğ’‚ğ’ğ’… ğ’šğ’ğ’–ğ’“ ğ’†ğ’šğ’†ğ’” ğ’”ğ’‘ğ’‚ğ’“ğ’Œğ’ğ’Šğ’ğ’ˆ." Come and explore your next adventure at the Ballyhoura Mountain Bike Trails ğŸš´ nestled in the beautiful Ballyhoura mountains â›°. Immerse yourself deep in the lush forest alive with native wildlife. 98km of flowy trails including forest road climbs, tight twisty singletrack with a rollercoaster of ups and downs and a boardwalk is guaranteed to leave you smiling. The trails range from the moderate 6km Greenwood loop to the demanding Castlepook loop, over 50km in length! Take on the trails at a speed suited to your current skillset. Park your car, rent a bike from @ballyhouratrailriders and off you go! After your adrenaline-fueled adventure, you can sate your appetite at the nearby @spruce_and_willow CafÃ© in Ardpatrick. #VisitBallyhoura #DiscoverIreland #IrelandsHiddenHeartlands #AdventureIsland #keepdiscovering #adventuretourism #loveireland #mtb #mtblife #mtbtrails

entry.title: Another wonderful day at the official reopening of Doneraile Court last week. The 5th most visited free attraction, Doneraile Court and Gardens is located in the North Cork area of Ballyhoura Country and itâ€™s one of the Irelandâ€™s most popular hidden gems
entry.content: Another wonderful day at the official reopening of Doneraile Court last week. The 5th most visited free attraction, Doneraile Court and Gardens is located in the North Cork area of Ballyhoura Country and itâ€™s one of the Irelandâ€™s most popular hidden gems ğŸ’. The â‚¬2m refurbishment of the Doneraile Court by @opwireland opened up the second floor to the public. It is now open 5 days a week until mid June and guided tours are available from 10am to 4pm Wednesday to Sunday and Bank holidays. It will be open 7 days a week from mid June ğŸ™Œâœ¨ #heritageireland #OPW #visitdoneraile #visitballyhoura #castletownhouse #irelandshiddenheartlands #ballyhoura #munstervales #purecork #guidesofireland #visitcork @Munster Vales @Pure Cork @Irelandâ€™s Hidden Heartlands @

entry.content: ğŸŒ¿ğŸ¥ We had an amazing time filming and exploring the beautiful Ballyhoura nature trail! The brand new signage made it even easier to navigate and discover all the hidden gems along the way. ğŸŒ³ Check out this reel for a sneak peek of our adventure and keep an eye for our new video release very soon ğŸ™ŒğŸ¬. If youâ€™re looking for a fun and scenic outdoor activity, Ballyhoura Nature Trail is the perfect spot! Itâ€™s located at the Ballyhoura Mountain Bike Centre ğŸšµâ€â™€ï¸ and it is a 40-minute 2km investigation of over 20 hidden creatures ğŸª¹ğŸª¶ğŸª²in the woods that kiddies have to uncover on their walk. For more information on the trail and other activities in the area, check out visitballyhoura.com. Trust us, you wonâ€™t be disappointed! ğŸ˜ #Ballyhoura #NatureTrail #ExploreIreland #OutdoorAdventure #VisitBallyhoura #naturelovers #irelandshiddenheartlands #munstervales #keepdiscovering #ballyhouramountains #ballyhouratrails #familyfriendlywalks
